comments: Collected in Bahamas and India. Number of plants named for him e.g. Lonicera braceana Hemsley.
examples: Solanum kurzii Brace ex Prain in J. Asiat. Soc. Bengal, 65: 541 (1896)
source: Proc. Linn. Soc., 151: 233-234 (1939). 'Louis' is an error in Publ. Field Mus. Nat. Hist., Bot. ser., 2(3): 138 (1906)
